bug.author: tompollok
bug.description:
Link broken in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/modules/calibration_module.md>https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/modules/calibration_module.md</denchmark-link>
In section "Installing the Calibration Module" the following link doesnt work <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/modules/installation.md#calibration-module>https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/modules/installation.md#calibration-module</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hey, this should be the correct link: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/installation.md#calibration-module>https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/installation.md#calibration-module</denchmark-link>
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mikelassi>@mikelassi</denchmark-link> ! Fixed in the latest commit. Best
